Text: So there's no English subs for the Russian parts?
Nevermind, I realized it's either all in French or all in Russian, right?

After so many disappointing downloads, I had to get the subtitles from this website:

http://surffd.WebStarts.com/index.html

Very good quality subs, perfectly synchronised and excellent translation, they have both the French and English versions + the PAL and NTSC system timecodes.
